review: When I had nobody to support me through hard times, Dr Shahiti helped me through by not just prescribing medications but by being compassionate and she clearly explained about the treatment plans and made sure I was comfortable.

Dr. Sahiti was kind and sweet, ensuring the conversation never felt awkward or judgmental. Despite initially consulting her for other issues, she provided attentive care when I was very sick with a high fever, which turned out to be dengue. She continued to offer guidance and support beyond our scheduled sessions. I highly recommend Dr. Sahiti for any gynecological concerns.

Its a lovely journey, I had throughout my pregnancy with Dr.Sahiti. Heard all my concerns, provided me with best prenatal course and was available with most patient behaviour during emergency scenarios. And now embarking post natal/ post-partum journey.  My delivery went out smoothly, even in times of panic her consultation helped me not to loose my strength. And I am on path to recovery with her help.
Thank you doc for all your help.
The nicest gynaecologist I’ve come across. No judgements,  in fact she was morally supportive throughout.

She was nurturing and helpful and informative 

She explained every step of what has happened and what the treatment is gonna be and how will the treatment affect us

I faced an emergency at night and ma’am was available to help and support me throughout the night 

Really grateful to have had support and assistance by Dr Sahiti Ma’am

Dr Sahiti is go to doctor as a gynaecologist. 

I loved how she handles each and every situation . 

I was admitted as an Emergency case at Apollo cradle Kormangla hospital . 

She handled the situation with me in the most swift manner providing the best care and treatment and immediate decision making.

Totally supportive and helpful and explains everything in detail without any misjudgment in any case . 


Thankyou so Much Dr. Sahiti !

Went for a consultation for big blood clots in period blood and post period blood. 
Out of all the doctors I’ve been to the past year she’s by far the best one I’ve been to. She was amazingly patient and non judgemental.She explained everything with clarity. Shes also a lil funny yet super professional. 
I highly recommend her.
The doctor was very helpful, Very professional yet friendly. Did a very good job with explaining and getting us through the whole procedure.
